## Purpose

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                      | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `groundColor` | `ground-color` | Color below horizon                                                              | `string`  | `'#080820'` |
| `helper`      | `helper`       | Show helper object to help locate the light                                      | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `intensity`   | `intensity`    | Light intensity multiplier                                                       | `number`  | `1`         |
| `offset`      | `offset`       | offset position of this object to new x,y,z location                             | `string`  | `''`        |
| `rotation`    | `rotation`     | change rotation of this object on x,y,z axis, values provided must be in degrees | `string`  | `''`        |
| `skyColor`    | `sky-color`    | Color above horizon                                                              | `string`  | `'#ffffbb'` |
